channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Yum! Brands Serves Up Digital Innovation
item.description: Yum! Brands Joe Park has developed an innovative digital agenda for the quick serve restaurant behemoth.

item.title: Comfortable with the fuzziness

item.title: Which Format Is The Best To Watch Wicked In The Cinema?
item.description: Not all movie theater screens are created equal, so which format will you be choosing to see Wicked?

item.title: Toward better

item.title: Game design and strategy (Bongo part 3)

item.title: Is there a market(place)?

item.title: Further vs. faster

item.title: Banks Need To Get Ready For A Major Challenge In 2025
item.description: Banking executives must step up their game on product and service innovation if they want to stay competitive and earn customer loyalty.

item.title: What’s So Great About Nvidia Blackwell?
item.description: An enhancement of Nvidia’s networking architecture is notable as the company continues to dominate data center markets.

item.title: ‘Wicked’ Review: A Spectacular Cinematic Triumph
item.description: A magical adaptation of one of the Broadway sensation that expands and enriches the musical while remaining faithful to the work.
